title: How to upgrade to your new iPhone without losing data
content:
The new iPhone SE 3 and fresh green variants of the iPhone 13 and 13 Pro are now officially available. Let’s look at how to transfer data to new iPhones with several different options to make sure you don’t lose any data.

more…

The post How to upgrade to your new iPhone without losing data appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This detailed guide covers multiple ways to transfer data to a new iPhone without losing anything as well as erasing your old iPhone.
